revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=W307R |revision=v1 |asin= |fcc_date=08/18/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TW307R |pcb_id=100300173 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=KH |fla1_model=KH29LV320DBTC-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6IH-75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;130, 6691, A944;1; |flags=schematics |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Wive-NG |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:B0:0C |oui_eth=00:B0:0C }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Broadband Router}} The S/N of the unit populating this entry is '''W307R001 100300173'''. :"V2.0" and a lead-free logo is silkscreened on the top of the board. PCB manuf. text of "N01204PN115A1", "SH6 94V-0", "E248779", and a date
code of '''0946''' (November 2009) is silkscreened on the bottom of the board. :The radial capacitors on the board are '''xunda''' branded. The [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1155028 FCC schematics] note the PA ICs as [http://www.richwave.com.tw/prd_wifi_pa.html '''RichWave''' ''RTC6691''] (QFN16). They are marked with "130 6691 A944" on the board of the unit noted above.
